title: Planet typography
content:
From A to Z... all the letters are on [Planet typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014111329/http:/www.planet-typography.com/).

[Planet typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014111329/http:/www.planet-typography.com/) is a portal dedicated to typefaces and typography which proposes a comprehensive directory of links, a webzine which introduces the most famous contemporary type designers (in the October issue, Jonathan Hoefler, designer of Hoefler text), a typographic manual, a bookshop and a section dedicated to the freeware creation.

The site was launched in 1999 and is edited by a typo addict (but who does not work in the graphic design industry). Its target is to educate type users (all of us who have a computer) to the art of type creation and to vulgarize its unknown art.

A new version has been launched in October.

URL: [www.planet-typography.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014111329/http:/www.planet-typography.com/)
